amendment.description: To allow additional time to file responses to motions.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1293 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 48. Record Vote Number: 24.
Amendment SA 1293 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S429-430; text: CR S429) To allow additional time to file responses to motions.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1293 proposed by Senator Schumer.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1293 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 48. Record Vote Number: 24.
